text: Sharon Carter (also known as Agent 13 and Destroyer) is a fictional character and superheroine appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. She was created by the late Stan Lee, the late Jack Kirby, and the late Dick Ayers, and first appeared in Tales of Suspense #75 in March of 1966. She is the niece of Peggy Carter, who was a famous agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. during the Second World War and the Cold War. She is usually depicted as a secret agent and an ex-field agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. under Nick Fury, and the girlfriend of Captain America. She is also a member of the Femme Force, Secret Avengers, and Daughters of Liberty. == In other media == Since her debut in the comics, she has appeared in numerous media. In the Marvel Cinematic Universe, she is portrayed by Emily VanCamp. Category:Marvel Comics superheroes
title: Sharon Carter
